bestgame_high.title: Most Kills Scoreboard
bestgame_high.description: Players are ranked based on their highest kill game this week. player with the best highest kill game wins

bestgame_low.title: Most Kills Scoreboard
bestgame_low.description: Players are ranked based on their highest kill game this week. player with the worst highest kill game wins.

worstgame_low.title: Least Kills Scoreboard
worstgame_low.description: Players are ranked based on their lowest kill game this week.player with the least kills in their worst game wins.

worstgame_high.title: Least Kills Scoreboard
worstgame_high.description:
Players are ranked based on their lowest kill game this week. player with the most kills in their worst game wins.
 i.e you have 3 games with kills of 3 ,6, 2 your score is 2.

average_high.title: Average Kills Scoreboard
average_high.description: Players are ranked based on their average kills across all games this week

average_low.title: Average Kills Scoreboard
average_low.description: Players are ranked based on their average kills across all games this week

bestgame_high.title: Most deaths Scoreboard
bestgame_high.description: Players are ranked based on their highest death game this week. player with the best highest death game wins
